Actors: Lucy Hale, Tyler Posey, Violett Beane, Hayden Szeto
Writer: Michael Reisz (story by), Michael Reisz (screenplay by), Jillian Jacobs (screenplay by), Christopher Roach (screenplay by), Jeff Wadlow (screenplay by)
Plot: A harmless game of Truth or Dare among friends turns deadly when someone -- or something -- begins to punish those who tell a lie or refuse the dare.
Title: Truth or Dare
